title: Ad Shyvana with 311 AD:
body:
2 Shots ADC's.

Auto crit for ~763 plus sheen proc bonus around level 14 for about 80 bonus damage plus Q straight after and if the first part of the dual attack crits that's another 763 plus 311 from the second part of that Q.

Grats you just did ~1900 damage in 0.2 seconds and can have 311 AD with Infinity Edge, Trinity Force, Last Whisper and Blade of the Ruined King at around level 15. (80 AD plus 40 AD plus 90ish base plus 40 AD plus 30 AD = roughly 300).

Add an AD scaling AOE, natural armor stats, %Max HP damage and a movespeed steroid and if AD Shyvana wasn't prone to kiting and wasn't hugely dependent on someone else to engage in this squishier play style you would have one mad top laner.

replies.body: yea "cow sweep" was doing this a while back, he brings it out every now and then when he isnt spamming yi.

Why trinity force over shiv? You have what? 30% crit? And you are expecting 3 auto's in a row to crit? Not likely.

AD crit sona would work in silver 2.

Lol Trinity Force is 5x as strong as a Shiv.

Yeah just funny wehen it happens tho.

Not recommending it, did say her weaknesses and point out that it's more for fun obv.

> [{quoted}](name=KiStorm,realm=OCE,application-id=Ntey9fRZ,discussion-id=AJOJfQIk,comment-id=00020000,timestamp=2015-06-11T10:40:59.666+0000)
>
> Lol Trinity Force is 5x as strong as a Shiv.
> 
> Yeah just funny wehen it happens tho.
> 
> Not recommending it, did say her weaknesses and point out that it's more for fun obv.

Not really, not on shyv. It's not that much better to justify the pricetag.
"But here, we'll buff her auto's while Burnout is active, because she didn't already have enough fucking damage already"

Oh that damage. But You forgot the fact that she deals a lot of mixed damage so it's hard to itemize against her. I rather the off-tank bruiser that can hard engage rather than the squishier DPS build you have.
Prefer that build too it's just entertaining 2 shotting people.
